entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:26 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:31 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:31 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:31 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
